Room.Name: Entrance to DeNail's Corn Fields
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the entrance to the DeNail Family Corn Fields labor office.
Room.LongDescription: DeNail is always willing to hire unskilled labor because he doesn't really have to pay them anything to clear out the crows and other pesty creatures that eat up the corn. The exit to the west leads out to Hafnia Way in the southwestern part of town. The corn fields are pretty large so you best watch out that you don't get lost.
